name: GIANT SEAHORSE

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The seahorse can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage if the seahorse moved 20+ feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit.

bonus_actions.name: Bubble Dash
bonus_actions.text: While underwater, the seahorse moves up to half its Swim Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

raw_text:
AC 14 	Initiative +1 (11)
HP 16 (3d10)
Speed 5 ft., Swim 40 ft.
Large Beast, Unaligned

sourceRef.file: docs/sources/Monster Manual/Animals - Monster Manual - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf
